text: Eric Finnesgard. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Finnesgard E (2023). utile.visuals: Create Visuals Publication. R package version 0.3.2, https://github.com/efinite/utile.visuals.
code: @Manual{,   title = {utile.visuals: Create Visuals for Publication},   author = {Eric Finnesgard},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.3.2},   url = {https://github.com/efinite/utile.visuals}, }

title: Create Visuals for Publication
text: set themes functions making visuals ggplot2.

title: Create Visuals for Publication
text: ggrisktable(): wrapper function calculate numbers risk survival model given set time points creates ggplot2 table .

title: Create Visuals for Publication
text: geom_stepconfint(): Produces step function confidence interval survival curves.

title: Create Visuals for Publication
text: theme_basic(): ggplot2 theme plots removes background elements. theme_risk(): ggplot2 theme risk tables removes background elements.

title: Create Visuals for Publication
text: append_table(): Aligns axes combines ggplot2 plot table single plot. Can handle legends.

what: Append a ggplot2 table to the bottom of a ggplot2 plot — append_table
title: Append a ggplot2 table to the bottom of a ggplot2 plot — append_table
text: Aligns axes combines ggplot2 plot table single plot. Can handle legends.

title: Append a ggplot2 table to the bottom of a ggplot2 plot — append_table
code: append_table(   plot = NULL,   table = NULL,   plot.height = 1,   table.height = 0.1,   plot.width = 1,   extract.legend = TRUE,   legend.width = 0.2,   legend.offset = -15 )

title: Append a ggplot2 table to the bottom of a ggplot2 plot — append_table
text: plot Required. ggplot2::ggplot() object. legend present, extracted. table Required. ggplot2::ggplot object. legend present, removed ignored. plot.height Optional. Numeric. Height plot relative table. Defaults 1. table.height Optional. Numeric. Height table relative plot. Defaults 0.1. plot.width Optional. Numeric. Width plot relative legend. Ignored legend present plot. Defaults 1. extract.legend Optional. Logical. Indicates whether extract legend plot reinsert adjacent final combined plot. May undesired legend already embedded within plot area. Defaults TRUE. legend.width Optional. Numeric. Width legend relative plot. Ignored legend present plot 'extract.legend'=FALSE. Defaults 0.2. legend.offset Optional. Numeric. Vertical offset legend. Used raise lower. Ignored legend present plot 'extract.legend'=FALSE. Defaults -15.

title: Append a ggplot2 table to the bottom of a ggplot2 plot — append_table
text: ggplot2 tableGrob object. Use grid::grid.draw() open RStudio viewer. Works ggplot2::ggsave() box.

title: Append a ggplot2 table to the bottom of a ggplot2 plot — append_table
text: ensure proper alignment, double check plots use scale breaks!

title: Append a ggplot2 table to the bottom of a ggplot2 plot — append_table
code: library(survival) library(ggplot2) library(broom) # tidy() model data library(grid) # grid.draw() finished plot  # Data with group names specified data_diabetic <- diabetic data_diabetic$trt <- as.factor(data_diabetic$trt) levels(data_diabetic$trt) <- c('None', 'Laser')  # Survival Model fit <- survfit(Surv(time, status) ~ trt, data = data_diabetic)  # Kaplan Meier (KM) Plot plot_km <- ggplot(  data = tidy(fit),  mapping = aes(x = time, y = estimate) ) +   geom_step(aes(color = strata)) +   geom_stepconfint(aes(ymin = conf.low, ymax = conf.high, fill = strata), alpha = 0.3) +   coord_cartesian(c(0, 50)) + # Note scale set here!   scale_x_continuous(expand = c(0.02,0)) +   labs(x = 'Time', y = 'Freedom From Event') +   scale_color_manual(     values = c('#d83641', '#1A45A7'),     name = 'Treatment',     labels = c('Laser', 'None'),     aesthetics = c('colour', 'fill')) +   theme_basic()  # Risk Table tbl_risk <- ggrisktable(fit, c(0, 10, 20, 30, 40, 50)) +   coord_cartesian(c(0, 50)) +   scale_x_continuous(expand = c(0.02,0)) +   theme_risk()  # Combine KM plot and risk table plot_cmbd <- append_table(   plot = plot_km,   table = tbl_risk )  # Draw in RStudio viewer grid.newpage() grid.draw(plot_cmbd)

what: Step function confidence intervals for ggplot2 — geom_stepconfint
title: Step function confidence intervals for ggplot2 — geom_stepconfint
text: Produces step function confidence interval survival curves.

title: Step function confidence intervals for ggplot2 — geom_stepconfint
code: geom_stepconfint(   mapping = NULL,   data = NULL,   stat = "identity",   position = "identity",   na.rm = FALSE,   ... )

title: Step function confidence intervals for ggplot2 — geom_stepconfint
text: mapping Aesthetic mappings aes() function. Like geom_ribbon(), must provide columns x, ymin (lower limit), ymax (upper limit). data data displayed layer. Can inherit ggplot parent. stat statistical transformation use data layer, string. Defaults 'identity'. position Position adjustment, either string, result call position adjustment function. na.rm FALSE, default, missing values removed warning. TRUE, missing values silently removed. ... Optional. ggplot geom_ribbon() arguments.

title: Step function confidence intervals for ggplot2 — geom_stepconfint
text: Adapted survminer package <https://github.com/kassambara/survminer>.

title: Step function confidence intervals for ggplot2 — geom_stepconfint
code: library(survival) library(broom) library(ggplot2)  fit <- survfit(Surv(time, status) ~ trt, data = diabetic) fit <- survfit0(fit) # connect origin  ggplot(   data = tidy(fit),   mapping = aes(x = time, y = estimate) ) +   geom_step(aes(color = strata)) +   geom_stepconfint(aes(ymin = conf.low, ymax = conf.high, fill = strata), alpha = 0.3) +   coord_cartesian(c(0, 50)) +   scale_x_continuous(expand = c(0.02,0)) +   labs(x = 'Time', y = 'Freedom From Event') +   scale_color_manual(     values = c('#d83641', '#1A45A7'),     name = 'Treatment',     labels = c('None', 'Laser'),     aesthetics = c('colour', 'fill')) +   theme_basic()

what: Create a ggplot2 table showing the number at risk — ggrisktable
title: Create a ggplot2 table showing the number at risk — ggrisktable
text: simple wrapper function calculates numbers risk survival model given set time points creates ggplot2 table .

title: Create a ggplot2 table showing the number at risk — ggrisktable
code: ggrisktable(   fit = NULL,   times = NULL,   text.color = "black",   strata.order = NULL )

title: Create a ggplot2 table showing the number at risk — ggrisktable
text: fit Required. survival::survfit() object. times Required. Numeric. One time points calculate number risk . text.color Optional. Character. Color text within table. Defaults 'black'. strata.order Optional. Character. Ordered names strata factor levels.

title: Create a ggplot2 table showing the number at risk — ggrisktable
text: unformatted ggplot2 table showing number risk.

title: Create a ggplot2 table showing the number at risk — ggrisktable
code: library(survival)  fit <- survfit(Surv(time, status) ~ trt, data = diabetic)  ggrisktable(    fit = fit,    times = c(0, 10, 20, 30, 40, 50),    strata.order = c('0', '1') ) + theme_risk()

title: Minimalist theme for ggplot2 — theme_basic
text: ggplot2 theme removes background elements.

title: Minimalist theme for ggplot2 — theme_basic
code: theme_basic(   base_size = 12,   base_family = "",   base_color = "black",   base_line_size = base_size/14,   base_rect_size = base_size/14 )

title: Minimalist theme for ggplot2 — theme_basic
text: base_size Optional. Numeric. Base font size. Defaults 14. base_family Optional. Numeric. Base font family. Defaults ?. base_color Optional. Character. Base color lines text. Defaults black. base_line_size Optional. Numeric. Base line element size. Defaults base_size/22. base_rect_size Optional. Numeric. Base rectangle element size. Defaults base_size/22.

title: Minimalist theme for ggplot2 — theme_basic
text: Recommend exporting PNG TIFF preserve background transparency.

what: Minimalist risk table theme for ggplot2 — theme_risk
title: Minimalist risk table theme for ggplot2 — theme_risk
text: ggplot2 theme removes background elements.

title: Minimalist risk table theme for ggplot2 — theme_risk
code: theme_risk(   base_size = 12,   base_family = "",   base_color = "black",   base_line_size = base_size/14,   base_rect_size = base_size/14 )

title: Minimalist risk table theme for ggplot2 — theme_risk
text: base_size Optional. Numeric. Base font size. Defaults 10. base_family Optional. Numeric. Base font family. Defaults ?. base_color Optional. Character. Base color lines text. Defaults black. base_line_size Optional. Numeric. Base line element size. Defaults base_size/22. base_rect_size Optional. Numeric. Base rectangle element size. Defaults base_size/22.

title: Minimalist risk table theme for ggplot2 — theme_risk
text: Recommend exporting PNG TIFF preserve background transparency.

title: utile.visuals 0.3.2
text: CRAN release: 2022-11-20

title: utile.visuals 0.3.2
text: Support linewidth parameter introduced ggplot:: version 0.3.4. theme_basic() now consistent legend title formatting. Fix class check error ggrisktable()

title: utile.visuals 0.3.1
text: CRAN release: 2022-02-14 Consolidation themes theme_basic() theme_risk(). Line text color can now selected base_color parameter. Additionally, sizes elements text now scale correctly specified base_size parameter. Fix survfit0 class check issues ggrisktable().

title: utile.visuals 0.3.0
text: CRAN release: 2021-01-26 connect_origin() removed redundantly replicated function survival::survfit0(). Thanks tip, Beth!

title: utile.visuals 0.2.4
text: connect_origin() now verifies whether strata column present.

title: utile.visuals 0.2.3
text: CRAN release: 2019-12-01 Added parameter ggrisktable() allow preemptive specification text color.

title: utile.visuals 0.2.2
text: Fixed inconsistency within theme_white().

title: utile.visuals 0.2.1
text: CRAN release: 2019-09-20 append_table(): Legend extraction can now toggled new extract.legend option. Extraction may desired behavior legend already embedded within plot area. ggrisktable(): New option strata.order added allow reordering strata final table. Now includes hard stops invalid option data. Added connect_origin connecting KM curves plot origin.

title: utile.visuals 0.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2019-07-11 Added ggrisktable() creating ggplot2 risk table survival::survfit() model. Added theme_risk_black() theme_risk_white() risk table formatting. Added append_table() adding ggplot2 risk table ggplot2 Kaplan Meier curve. theme_black()|theme_white(): Updated axis title formating. Updated documentation.

title: utile.visuals 0.1.1
text: CRAN release: 2019-06-14 First public release
